summary: WHEN I ACCELERATE MY FORD EXPLORER THE EXHAUST FUMES ARE FILLING THE CABIN, WE ARE EXPERIENCING A ROTTEN EGG ODOR THAT BASICALLY MAKES YOU SICK. I HAVE TAKEN THE VEHICLE TO THE FORD DEALERSHIP 3 TIMES, THEY ATTEMPTED TO CORRECT THE PROBLEM BUT THEY WERE NOT SUCCESSFUL.    WE CANNOT USE THE VEHICLE FOR LONG TRIPS LAST TIME WE TRY IT WAS VERY UNCOMFORTABLE, I GOT SICK WITH THE FUMES.
